member.name: IDCompositionTranslateTransform.SetOffsetX
member.summary: Changes the value of the OffsetX property of a 2D translation transform. The OffsetX property specifies the distance to translate along the x-axis.
member.param: The distance to translate along the x-axis, in pixels.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionTranslateTransform.SetOffsetX
member.summary: Animates the value of the OffsetX property of a 2D translation transform. The OffsetX property specifies the translation along the x-axis.
member.param: An animation object that determines how the value of the OffsetX property changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.summary: Represents a 2D transformation that affects only the offset of a visual along the x-axis and y-axis.
